name: Kanken 4級 Reading Quiz
instructions: Type the reading of the below word in Hiragana!

cards.question: 依然
cards.meaning: still, as yet, as it has been

cards.question: 監視
cards.meaning: monitoring, watching, observation, surveillance, guarding, inspection

cards.question: 歳入
cards.meaning: annual revenue (government), annual income (government), budget receipts

cards.question: 土産
cards.meaning: present, souvenir, product of the land

cards.question: 甘言
cards.meaning: sweet words, smooth talk, cajolery, flattery, sycophancy

cards.question: 日和
cards.meaning: weather, climatic conditions, ideal weather (for some action, event, etc.), perfect day

cards.question: 転倒
cards.meaning: falling down, tumbling, overturning, turning over, cognitive distortion

cards.question: 奇抜
cards.meaning: novel, original, striking, strange, eccentric, fantastic

cards.question: 門出
cards.meaning: leaving one's own house (e.g. when going to war), departure, setting out

cards.question: 仕業
cards.meaning: deed (esp. negative), act, action, one's doing

cards.question: 就寝
cards.meaning: going to bed, retiring (for the night)

cards.question: 侵入
cards.meaning: invasion, incursion, raid, aggression, intrusion, trespass, penetration

cards.question: 匹敵
cards.meaning: to be a match for, to rival, to equal, to compare with, to be equivalent to

cards.question: 感涙
cards.meaning: tears (from being deeply moved), tears of gratitude

cards.question: 腐心
cards.meaning: taking pains to, racking one's brains, doing everything one can

cards.question: 浮沈
cards.meaning: floating and sinking, rise and fall, ebb and flow, ups and downs

cards.question: 抜群
cards.meaning: outstanding, excellent, exceptional, surpassing, extraordinary, distinguished

cards.question: 添付
cards.meaning: attachment (e.g. email), appendix (e.g. of a report, document, etc), annex, appendage, annexure

cards.question: 軽薄
cards.meaning: frivolous, flippant, superficial, shallow, trifling, insincere

cards.question: 搬入
cards.meaning: taking in, bringing in (esp. heavy objects, artwork, furniture), carrying in

cards.question: 避難
cards.meaning: taking refuge, finding shelter, evacuation, escape

cards.question: 陣営
cards.meaning: camp (group of same ideological beliefs), faction (of political party)

cards.question: 扱う
cards.meaning: to deal with (a person), to treat, to handle, to take care of, to entertain

cards.question: 偉い
cards.meaning: great, excellent, admirable, remarkable, distinguished, important, celebrated, famous, eminent

cards.question: 間違える
cards.meaning: to make a mistake (in), to commit an error (e.g. in calculation)

cards.question: 煙突
cards.meaning: chimney, smokestack, funnel (of a ship), stovepipe

cards.question: 奥
cards.meaning: inner part, inside, interior, depths (e.g. of a forest), back (of a house, drawer, etc.), bottom (e.g. of one's heart), recesses, heart

cards.question: 刈る
cards.meaning: to cut (hair), to mow (grass), to harvest, to clip, to shear, to reap, to trim, to prune

cards.question: 汗
cards.meaning: sweat, perspiration, khan (medieval ruler of a Tatary tribe)

cards.question: 乾燥
cards.meaning: dryness, aridity, drying (e.g. clothes), dehydration, desiccation

cards.question: 含蓄
cards.meaning: implication, significance, connotation, depth of meaning, complications of a problem

cards.question: 詰める
cards.meaning: to stuff into, to jam, to cram, to pack, to fill, to plug, to stop up

cards.question: 脚
cards.meaning: foot, counter for chairs or seats

cards.question: 幾分
cards.meaning: somewhat, to some extent, to some degree

cards.question: 輝く
cards.meaning: to shine, to glitter, to sparkle

cards.question: 丘
cards.meaning: hill, height, knoll, rising ground, mound

cards.question: 叫ぶ
cards.meaning: to shout, to cry, to scream, to shriek, to yell, to exclaim

cards.question: 狂言
cards.meaning: kyogen, farce presented between noh plays or during the interlude of a noh play

cards.question: 実況
cards.meaning: actual state (of things), real state, actual condition, real condition, actual scene

cards.question: 恐怖
cards.meaning: fear, dread, dismay, terror, horror, scare, panic

cards.question: 音響
cards.meaning: sound, noise, acoustics, reverberation, echo, audio

cards.question: 驚嘆
cards.meaning: wonder, admiration, being struck with admiration

cards.question: 屈指
cards.meaning: leading, foremost, preeminent, outstanding, one of the best

cards.question: 盗掘
cards.meaning: illegal digging, illegal mining, grave robbing, tomb robbing

cards.question: 迎合
cards.meaning: ingratiation, pandering, catering (to), going along with (someone or something), accommodating oneself (e.g. to public opinion), deuteragonist, secondary or supporting actor in a noh or kyogen play (possibly multiple actors)

cards.question: 圏内
cards.meaning: (being) within range (radio, commuting, etc.), (being) within the sphere (e.g. of influence)

cards.question: 遣わす
cards.meaning: to send, to dispatch, to despatch

cards.question: 玄関
cards.meaning: entranceway, entry hall, vestibule, foyer, entryway, mud room

cards.question: 攻防
cards.meaning: offense and defense, offence and defence

cards.question: 荒野
cards.meaning: wasteland, wilderness, deserted land, prairie, vast plain, wilds, desert, wild land

cards.question: 豪快
cards.meaning: hearty, exciting, stirring, lively, heroic, largehearted, splendid

cards.question: 見込み
cards.meaning: hope, promise, possibility, chance, probability, likelihood

cards.question: 趣旨
cards.meaning: meaning, point (e.g. of a statement), gist, effect

cards.question: 刺激
cards.meaning: stimulus, impetus, incentive, encouragement, motivation, provocation, excitement, thrill

cards.question: 執る
cards.meaning: to take (trouble), to attend (to business), to command (army)

cards.question: 雑煮
cards.meaning: soup containing rice cakes and vegetables (New Year's dish)

cards.question: 朱肉
cards.meaning: thick red ink (used for signature seals), red ink pad, vermillion ink, cinnabar ink

cards.question: 襲来
cards.meaning: invasion, raid, attack, visitation (of a calamity)

cards.question: 大丈夫
cards.meaning: safe, all right, alright, OK, okay, sure, great man, fine figure of a man

cards.question: 畳
cards.meaning: tatami mat, Japanese straw floor coverings, counter for tatami mats, folding paper-case, kimono wrapping paper

cards.question: 寝食
cards.meaning: bed and food, eating and sleeping

cards.question: 吹く
cards.meaning: to blow (e.g. wind), to play a wind instrument

cards.question: 旧姓
cards.meaning: one's original family name, maiden name

cards.question: 訴える
cards.meaning: to raise, to bring to (someone's attention)

cards.question: 代替
cards.meaning: substitution, alternation, taking over (e.g. store or family's headship)

cards.question: 光沢
cards.meaning: brilliance, polish, lustre, luster, glossy finish (of photographs)

cards.question: 丹念
cards.meaning: painstaking, careful, meticulous, scrupulous, detailed, elaborate

cards.question: 恥部
cards.meaning: private parts, privates, genitalia, secret place

cards.question: 蓄える
cards.meaning: to store, to save up, to stock up on, to lay in stock, to set aside

cards.question: 跳ねる
cards.meaning: to jump, to leap, to prance, to spring up, to bound, to hop

cards.question: 沈着
cards.meaning: settling or depositing (at the bottom of something), deposition, pigmentation

cards.question: 添える
cards.meaning: to garnish, to accompany (as a card does a gift)

cards.question: 倒産
cards.meaning: (corporate) bankruptcy, insolvency, commercial failure, failed business

cards.question: 雑踏
cards.meaning: hustle and bustle, throng, crowd, congestion, traffic jam

cards.question: 闘う
cards.meaning: to make war (on), to wage war (against), to go to war (with), to fight (with), to do battle (against)

cards.question: 急所
cards.meaning: vital part (of the body), tender spot, weak point, vitals, vital point (critical place to make a move in the game of Go)

cards.question: 悩む
cards.meaning: to be worried, to be troubled

cards.question: 濃密
cards.meaning: thick, dense, rich (as in taste or content), deep (colour), strong (smell, scent)

cards.question: 輩出
cards.meaning: turning out in great numbers, appearing one after the other

cards.question: 外泊
cards.meaning: spending night somewhere else (usu. away from home), sleepover, sleep over

cards.question: 抜群
cards.meaning: outstanding, excellent, exceptional, surpassing, extraordinary, distinguished

cards.question: 全般
cards.meaning: (the) whole, entirety, wholly, as a whole, generally, universally

cards.question: 販路
cards.meaning: market (for goods, services, etc.), outlet (for selling), opening

cards.question: 規範
cards.meaning: model, standard, pattern, norm, criterion, example

cards.question: 彼岸
cards.meaning: equinoctial week (when Buddhist services are held)

cards.question: 被災
cards.meaning: being a victim of (some disaster), suffering from

cards.question: 避暑
cards.meaning: escaping the summer heat, going somewhere cooler during the summer, summering

cards.question: 首尾
cards.meaning: beginning and end, from beginning to end

cards.question: 賦与
cards.meaning: being endowed with (e.g. a gift), being blessed with, endowment

cards.question: 手柄
cards.meaning: achievement, feat, meritorious deed, distinguished service

cards.question: 捕らえる
cards.meaning: to catch, to capture, to seize, to arrest, to grab, to catch hold of

cards.question: 老舗
cards.meaning: old shop, shop of long standing

cards.question: 抱える
cards.meaning: to hold or carry under or in the arms

cards.question: 離合
cards.meaning: alliance and rupture, meeting and parting

cards.question: 上手
cards.meaning: skillful, skilled, proficient, good (at), adept, clever, upper part

cards.question: 頼む
cards.meaning: to request, to beg, to ask

cards.question: 退く
cards.meaning: to step back, to move back, to retreat, to step aside, to move (i.e. out of the way), to make way, to draw back, to recede

cards.question: 心地
cards.meaning: feeling, sensation, mood, padding, lining, foundation

cards.question: 手伝う
cards.meaning: to help, to assist, to aid

cards.question: 脈絡
cards.meaning: chain of reasoning, logical connection, coherence, context

cards.question: 茂る
cards.meaning: to grow thickly, to be in full leaf, to be rampant, to luxuriate, to be luxurious

cards.question: 神妙
cards.meaning: meek, quiet, docile, humble, faithful, obedient

cards.question: 非凡
cards.meaning: extraordinary, uncommon, remarkable, unusual, rare, prodigious

cards.question: 隣
cards.meaning: neighbor (neighbour), next to (esp. living next door to)

cards.question: 五月
cards.meaning: May, fifth month of the lunar calendar

cards.question: 奇術
cards.meaning: magic, conjuring, sleight of hand, legerdemain

cards.question: 大人
cards.meaning: adult, man of substance or virtue, gentleman

cards.question: 白髪
cards.meaning: white hair, grey hair, gray hair

cards.question: 仮名
cards.meaning: kana, Japanese syllabary (i.e. hiragana, katakana), alias, pseudonym, pen name, nom de plume

cards.question: 人影
cards.meaning: figure of a person, figures of people

cards.question: 七夕
cards.meaning: Star Festival (held in July or August), Tanabata, Festival of the Weaver

cards.question: 甘い
cards.meaning: sweet-tasting, sweet, sugary, sugared, skillful, skilful, clever, expert, wise, successful

cards.question: 越える
cards.meaning: to cross over, to cross, to pass through, to pass over (out of)

cards.question: 梅雨
cards.meaning: rainy season (in Japan from early June to mid-July)

cards.question: 恵む
cards.meaning: to bless, to show mercy to

cards.question: 送迎
cards.meaning: seeing off and meeting on return

cards.question: 失脚
cards.meaning: losing one's position, losing one's standing, falling (from power), being overthrown, downfall

cards.question: 差し
cards.meaning: between (e.g. two people), face to face, ruler, measure

cards.question: 警戒
cards.meaning: vigilance, caution, alertness, precaution, being on guard

cards.question: 仰天
cards.meaning: being amazed, being horrified, being taken aback

cards.question: 押さえる
cards.meaning: to pin something down, to hold something down, to hold something back, to stop, to restrain, to curb

cards.question: 兼ねる
cards.meaning: to be unable to, to find difficult (unpleasant, awkward, painful) to do

cards.question: 鑑識
cards.meaning: judgement, judgment, discernment, discrimination, having an eye for

cards.question: 鎖国
cards.meaning: national isolation, closing the country (to foreigners)

cards.question: 隠然
cards.meaning: latent, hidden, secret, behind the scenes

cards.question: 軒先
cards.meaning: edge of the eaves, house frontage

cards.question: 香水
cards.meaning: perfume, scented water used for purification, water offering to Buddha

cards.question: 傾倒
cards.meaning: devoting oneself to, concentrating on, commitment, admiration, adoration

cards.question: 皆無
cards.meaning: nonexistent, nil, none, nothing (at all), bugger-all

cards.question: 精鋭
cards.meaning: elite, best, pick, cream of the crop

cards.question: 万歳
cards.meaning: crying "banzai" (or raising one's hands in the banzai gesture), door-to-door comedic duo

cards.question: 中継
cards.meaning: relay, hook-up, joining, joint, intermediation, relaying, intermediary, agency, brokerage

cards.question: 攻守
cards.meaning: offense and defense, offence and defence, batting and fielding

cards.question: 記載
cards.meaning: record, statement, description, mention, listing, registration, booking, entry

cards.question: 応援
cards.meaning: aid, assistance, help, reinforcement, rooting, barracking, support, cheering

cards.question: 投稿
cards.meaning: contribution, submission, posting (e.g. to a newsgroup or mailing list)

cards.question: 脱却
cards.meaning: ridding oneself, freeing oneself of, growing out of, overcoming, outgrowing

cards.question: 丈夫
cards.meaning: healthy, robust, strong, solid, durable, hero, manly person, warrior

cards.question: 踏破
cards.meaning: travelling on foot, traveling on foot

cards.question: 釈然
cards.meaning: fully satisfied, well satisfied (e.g. with an explanation or apology), to have one's heart completely cleared of doubt or grudge

cards.question: 添う
cards.meaning: to meet (wishes, expectations, etc.), to satisfy, to comply with, to live up to

cards.question: 鮮やか
cards.meaning: vivid, bright, brilliant, clear, fresh, vibrant

cards.question: 胴衣
cards.meaning: padded, sleeveless undergarment, vest, (sleeveless) undergarment, padded undershirt

cards.question: 時雨
cards.meaning: rain shower in late autumn (fall) or early winter

cards.question: 濁る
cards.meaning: to become muddy, to become cloudy, to get impure (of a liquid, gas, etc.)

cards.question: 肩車
cards.meaning: giving someone a ride on one's shoulders

cards.question: 耐える
cards.meaning: to bear, to stand, to endure, to put up with

cards.question: 竹刀
cards.meaning: bamboo sword (for kendo), bamboo fencing stick

cards.question: 惨事
cards.meaning: disaster, tragedy, tragic incident, horrible accident

cards.question: 脱退
cards.meaning: withdrawal (e.g. from an organization), secession, leaving, pulling out

cards.question: 一日
cards.meaning: one day, first day of the month

cards.question: 踏襲

cards.question: 丹精
cards.meaning: working earnestly, sincerity, diligence, effort, pains

cards.question: 拍手
cards.meaning: clapping hands, applause, clapping one's hands in prayer (at a shrine)

cards.question: 父さん
cards.meaning: father, dad, papa, pa, pop, daddy, dada

cards.question: 弾む

cards.question: 後輩

cards.question: 込む

cards.question: 腐る
cards.meaning: to rot, to go bad, to decay, to spoil, to fester, to decompose, to turn sour (e.g. milk)

cards.question: 希薄
cards.meaning: thin (e.g. air), diluted, sparse, lean, weak, rarified, rarefied

cards.question: 敷く

cards.question: 下手
cards.meaning: unskillful, poor, awkward, lower part, foot, lower direction, humble position, inferior

cards.question: 伺う
cards.meaning: to ask, to inquire, to hear, to be told

cards.question: 贈る
cards.meaning: to give (as a gift), to present

cards.question: 備蓄
cards.meaning: stockpile, reserves, storing, stocking up, laying in (supplies)

cards.question: 吐く
cards.meaning: to breathe out, to breathe, to vomit, to throw up, to spit up

cards.question: 市販
cards.meaning: selling on the market (in the marketplace, in stores, etc.), making something commercially available
